body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

This is a known issue with htop failing to compile with gcc@10 described here: https://github.com/hishamhm/htop/issues/986

The issue is spack is using an out of date archived repository: https://github.com/hishamhm/htop and should migrate to the new repository https://github.com/htop-dev/htop/ where htop is now at version 3.1.1 instead of 2.2.0 currently in spack. 

```console
$ spack install htop
==> Installing pkgconf-1.8.0-lrmborqevcera4mjkahcq4gogyxvd7l5
==> No binary for pkgconf-1.8.0-lrmborqevcera4mjkahcq4gogyxvd7l5 found: installing from source
```
